summary: The Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine is one of the Nobel Prizes which were created by Alfred Nobel.
full_text: Rosalyn Sussman Yalow  was an American medical physicist, and a co-winner of the 1977 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine  for development of the radioimmunoassay  technique. She was the second American woman to be awarded the Nobel Prize Physiology or Medicine after Gerty Cori.
title: Rosalyn Sussman Yalow
